alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:35AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Suwannee and southwestern Hamilton Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 935 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Madison to near Luraville to 10 miles north of Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Suwannee Springs, Suwannee River State Park, Wellborn, Dowling Park, Obrien, Crossroads, Mcalpin, Luraville and Branford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
